channel.title: Photography on Chris Lyons
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Chris Lyons

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: As someone who refuses the title of photographer but won’t leave home without a camera, I fall in the niche (although growing?) category of point-and-shoot enthusiasts. I practically hate using a smartphone to take photos. There is something about holding a sometimes $1k+ piece of glass by the corners that takes you out of the environment you are trying to capture. For Christmas I was gifted a camp-snap 103b camera. For me, it was the perfect gift because it was something I had been on the fence of buying for a while. If you are not familiar
